description.high:
Wow! This ia Blue-Eyes White Dragon!! Legendary monstor in Yu-Gi-Oh!

description.medium:
It's Yennefer of Vengerberg from Gwent. Powerful witch from famous Witcher series.
Maybe she is looking for her Geralt.
description.low: Huh.. A peach card from Legends of the Three Kingdom. It was trending a decade ago but lost its market for a while now.
